meanings.definition: A person who quarrels or argues with others.
meanings.sent1: The quarrellers in the playground were shouting loudly.
meanings.sent2: The two quarrellers couldn't agree on which game to play.
meanings.sent3: The quarrellers ended up laughing together after their argument.
meanings.sent4: The quarrellers were like two stubborn goats butting heads.
meanings.sent5: The image of the quarrellers stuck in my mind all day.

meanings.sent1: We saw a group of quarrellers at the market.
meanings.sent2: The quarrellers gathered in the town square to settle their disputes.
meanings.sent3: The quarrellers looked like a flock of colorful birds squabbling over food.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with the noise of the quarrellers arguing.
meanings.sent5: The quarrellers' voices echoed through the narrow alleyways.
